name: get_search_suggestions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Search suggestions are a quick and easy way to find data on coinranking. The endpoint only accepts one parameter; a query. With this query you can find currencies (including fiat), exchanges and markets, by their symbol or name. The response always returns a set of the most prominent coins, exchanges and markets matching your query.

query.description: The search term to look for. Can be a currency name, symbol, exchange, or market.

referencecurrencyuuid.description:
UUID of reference currency, in which the coin prices are calculated. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl
